Kartia Researcher:
Kartia Labyrinth is flooed with demons. Three of their Leaders, are about to enter into our world. It is necessary to prevent their invasion. However, they are non-material beings from another dimension, so we cannot destroy them copletely. But we can destroy the demons.
I ask you to remove Zellaka and his minions in the Kartia Labyrinth.
Ask whether you can do it alone
